00054   inline static void Cluster(const MatType& data,
00055                              const size_t clusters,
00056                              arma::Col<size_t>& assignments)
00057   {
00058     // Implementation is so simple we'll put it here in the header file.
00059     assignments = arma::shuffle(arma::linspace<arma::Col<size_t> >(0,
